mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, userPwd, userName, email, phone, authority, joinDate) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{authority}, now());
mapper.select: select likeId, houseinfo.aptCode, apartmentName, houseinfo.dongCode, sidoName, gugunName, dongName, houseinfo.lat, houseinfo.lng from houselike, houseinfo join baseaddress on houseinfo.dongCode = baseaddress.dongCode where userId = #{userId} and houselike.aptCode = houseinfo.aptCode
